title: build failure: librustc-0d83f02f-0.10-pre.so: undefined reference to `LLVMRustDebugMetadataVersion'
body:
Hello. Just stumbled upon build failure.

```
compile_and_link: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustdoc
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1
note: cc arguments: '-m64' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-o' 'x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/rustc' 'x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/rustc.o' '-Wl,--as-needed' '-Wl,-O1' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/.rust' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lstd-966edb7e-0.10-pre' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lgreen-80d9e76a-0.10-pre' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lrustuv-09e0b925-0.10-pre' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lextra-64ade3d6-0.10-pre' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lflate-14e9482b-0.10-pre' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lsyntax-ebc61d75-0.10-pre' '-L/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-lrustc-0d83f02f-0.10-pre' '-lpthread' '-lrt' '-lrt' '-lstdc++' '-ldl' '-lm' '-lpthread' '-lmorestack' '-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/../lib' '-Wl,-rpath,/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib' '-Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib'
note: /opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc-0d83f02f-0.10-pre.so: undefined reference to `LLVMRustAddModuleFlag'
/opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc-0d83f02f-0.10-pre.so: undefined reference to `LLVMRustDebugMetadataVersion'
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status

error: aborting due to previous error
...
note: /opt/scratch/work/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc-0d83f02f-0.10-pre.so: undefined reference to `LLVMRustAddModuleFlag'
```

Thanks
